overview: It's hard to believe that Cedarmont Kids has reached the 20-year mark and is still going strong! In fact, once again, Action Bible Songs was the #1 non-seasonal Children's CD for the CBA market in 2012. To celebrate, Cedarmont is releasing a specially-packaged collection with all 6 of the first Cedarmont titles at an unbelievable price.
title: Cedarmont Kids 20th Anniversary Collection
